summary:
✅ Master of Business (Sport Management) - Australia 🇦🇺 
✅ Bachelor of Management Studies - New Zealand 🇳🇿 
✅ 10+ Years of International Management Experience 🇸🇦🇬🇧🇸🇪🇳🇱🇪🇸 

I am an accomplished Business Management Professional with extensive experience in Business Strategy, Digital Marketing, Retail Management and Sales.

My key qualities and achievements include:

🔵  Leadership, building and developing winning teams to perform at their optimal levels and achieve business growth by increasing retail sales and improving the customer experience.  
🔵  Analytical and critical thinker who adjusts easily to change while maintaining high production levels and constantly seeking to improve performance, quality and competitiveness.
🔵  Strong team player able to create a harmonious working environment for staff

My retail, sales, customer services and relations experiences are comprehensive and include developing online marketing, sales and promotions campaigns. I possess an inherent passion for customer and client relations and I have acquired an array of technical abilities through work experience. 

I can be reached at e_ahmedsa@hotmail.com
